synopsis.text: The cherished amusement park that holds fond memories for Keiichi and Belldandy is on the brink of shutting down. Seizing the opportunity for a nostalgic visit, the pair decide to spend one last day at the park, relishing their time together. Unbeknownst to them, Belldandy's burgeoning powers are inadvertently causing her divine presence to fade from Earth. As the unsuspecting couple revel in their shared happiness, Urd and Skuld are working against the clock to devise a solution. The source of the problem lies in Belldandy's overwhelming joy, which, if left unchecked, could render the Goddesses obsolete in this world. In a race to preserve their existence, Urd and Skuld must unravel the mystery behind Belldandy's emotional surge before it spirals out of control.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
